MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD1 and EH34 postcode area of Galashiels and Walkerburn. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:08pm due to reports of grounded overhead lines near Ashiestiel Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:13pm on Wednesday, 04 November 2020
